title: Faroe Islands Inflation Rate QoQ
description: The Consumer Price Index in Faroe Islands increased 1.70 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Faroe Islands averaged 0.36 percent from 2001 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 3.80 percent in the second quarter of 2022 and a record low of -1.30 percent in the first quarter of 2015. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - Faroe Islands Inflation Rate QoQ- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Faroe Islands
